Html:
I got a slew of Microsoft Office 2007 updates today (June 14, 2007) and they broke all my NetOffice COM add-ins for Excel, including the samples provided with NetOffice. They refuse to load at startup or to load from the COM Add-ins selection screen.

Oddly, a third party COM add-in from IBM is still working. Has anyone else had this happen or has found out which specific update caused this problem?

Hi Michael,
NetOffice is compatible with MS Office 2007.

Please, provide logs from Microsoft Office Configuration Analyzer Tool to help us troubleshoot your issue
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=36852
